name: authenticator
description: For Google Authenticator and Battle.net Authenticator.

scripts.copyChrome: cp -r src build css images js _locales LICENSE *.html chrome
scripts.copyFirefox: cp -r src build css images js _locales LICENSE *.html firefox
scripts.chrome: mkdir -p chrome && npm run compile && npm run copyChrome && cp manifest-chrome.json chrome/manifest.json
scripts.firefox: mkdir -p firefox && npm run compile && npm run copyFirefox && cp manifest-firefox.json firefox/manifest.json
